de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system
Class SessionHandler

java.lang.Object
  de.gianfelice.aeskulab.system.SessionHandler
All Implemented Interfaces:
com.vaadin.service.ApplicationContext.TransactionListener, java.io.Serializable
public class SessionHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements com.vaadin.service.ApplicationContext.TransactionListener

This class handles user sessions and is used to store the active user.

Version:
1.1.2
Author:
Kim (http://code.google.com/p/vaadin-appfoundation), Matthias Gianfelice
See Also:
